divs: Sighting Details i was sitting in my concervetry about 7PM on thenight clear sky but comming over later was some cloud.looking out of the windowi saw a dot as i thought on the window.i got up and went to scratch it of andnoticed it was outside in the sky.fetched my binocs and went down the gardentohave a good look,and i saw a large triangle upside down.the sun was setting,onthe sun side it was glowing bright silver on the other side it was black shadedfrom the sun and turning slowly from right to left.after about 15 minutes thecloud came over the object waited till the cloud had gone,and the object hadgone also.
Summary: Large cone turning gently from right to left.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Loughborough
There were no other sightings in Loughborough on or around November 30th 2001
